testcase.classname: User searches for connections throughout Berlin
testcase.name: User can list connections without SBahn options after inserting valid addresses in Berlin
testcase.system-out: Given user is on main page..................................................passed When User inserts the following start address "Holzmarkt StraÃŸe 15-17"......passed And User inserts the following ziel address "Europaplatz 1".................passed And User opens Erweiterte list..............................................passed And User deselects SBahn....................................................passed And User closes Erweiterte list.............................................passed And User clicks on Verbindung Finden button.................................passed Then User verifies the possible connections without SBahn lines.............passed
